Play that thang!

The Flower of Scotland

INTRO:
F-Bb-F x2
F-C-F

O Fflower of Scotland
When will we Csee your like Fagain
That Bbfought and Fdied for
Your Cwee bit hill and Fglen
BbAnd stood Fagainst him
Proud BbEdward’s Farmy
And Bbsent him hoFmeward
Tae Ebthink Fagain

C7

The Fhills are bare now
And autumn Cleaves lie thick and Fstill
O’er Bbland that is Flost now
Which Cthose so dearly Fheld
BbAnd stood agaFinst him
Proud BbEdward’s Farmy
And Bbsent him homFeward
Tae Ebthink Fagain

PLAY INSTRUMENTAL TO TUNE HALF STEP UP BACK DOWN

CThose Fdays are Cpassed Fnow
And in the Cpast they must Fremain
But Bbwe can still Frise now
And Cbe the nation Fagain
BbThat stood Fagainst him
Proud BbEdward’s Farmy
And Bbsent him Fhomeward
EbTae think again

F-Bb-F x2
F-C7-F

END on F
